alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:01PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson County through 230 PM CDT... At 200 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Stowell, or 12 miles south of Hamshire. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Jefferson County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
